Reviews.Title: great phone great service
Reviews.Author: JUSTIN JOLLIFF
Reviews.Content: like the phone even came with free car charger,  car charger quit working unless you held wire right after about a month but I was just an extra thing they put in box.  Phone has been great

Reviews.Title: I have this phone, one of the best phones for Sprint right now.
Reviews.Author: Dennis
Reviews.Content: The 4g on this phone is fast. The other guy who voted this phone down, he was just mad that he didn't get a charger.

Reviews.Title: good phone lousey battery
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Love the phone love the touch screen and the key board love the price.  Battery only lasts for about 6-7 hours.

Reviews.Title: Still good
Reviews.Author: Brittany Williams
Reviews.Content: I switched it to cricket b/c sprint sucks now with the internet. However this phone keeps restarting and it drives me. However, besides that it works.

Reviews.Title: Loved the Phone
Reviews.Author: Hope Denise Farmer
Reviews.Content: Loved the phone, the screen, the camera, and the qwerty slide-out keypad.  However, I am NOT a fan of Sprint.

Reviews.Title: Electric charge chord
Reviews.Author: Kricket
Reviews.Content: The wrong type of charger was sent. Have sent three emails with one reply. I've only requested a change of chords.Otherwise the phone is great.
